title: IT2media.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions
description: Extension methods for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abtractions ILogger. Use LogDebug, LogTrace, LogInformation, LogWarning, LogError, LogCritical without paramater EventID. The EventID is generated automatically by the GetHashCodeUShort() extension for strings based on the message string.

packOptions.summary: Some extension methods for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abtractions ILogger
packOptions.releaseNotes: Added overloads for excpetion and params only logging (without message string), fixed cases of NullReferenceExceptions when passing nulls directly to params object[] args
